subtitle.part1: We resolve all your doubts about

types.question: What types of mapping files do you offer?
types.answer: We offer Stage 1, Stage 2, Pop & Bang, DPF/EGR Delete, and custom maps for all brands. Each file is specifically optimized for your vehicle and needs.

delivery.question: How long does delivery take?
delivery.answer: Delivery is immediate after payment confirmation. You receive your optimized file in less than 30 minutes, ready to install.

warranty.question: Do you offer warranty on the files?
warranty.answer: Yes, all our files include complete warranty. If you have any problem, we provide technical support and revisions at no additional cost.

ecus.question: What ECUs are compatible?
ecus.answer: We work with all major ECUs: Bosch, Continental, Siemens, Delphi, Marelli, and more. Guaranteed compatibility with your vehicle.

safety.question: Is it safe for my engine?
safety.answer: Absolutely. Our maps respect the engine's safety limits, maintaining reliability while optimizing performance.

request.question: How do I request a custom file?
request.answer: Contact us with your vehicle details and objectives. Our technical team will create a custom map specific to your needs.

results.subtitle: Verified dyno results from our professional ECU remapping services

generalInfo.title: 1. GENERAL INFORMATION
generalInfo.content: In compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and Spanish Organic Law 3/2018 on Personal Data Protection and guarantee of digital rights, we inform you about the processing of your personal data.

dataController.title: 2. DATA CONTROLLER
dataController.content: Personal data collected through this website is processed under the responsibility of our company, domiciled in Spain and subject to Spanish and European legislation on data protection.

dataCollection.title: 3. DATA WE COLLECT
dataCollection.intro: We collect the following types of data:

items.contact: Contact data: Email address, phone number
items.navigation: Navigation data: IP address, cookies, website usage data
items.transaction: Transaction data: Purchase information and file downloads
items.technical: Technical data: Vehicle information for file customization

purpose.title: 4. PURPOSE OF PROCESSING
purpose.intro: We process your personal data for the following purposes:

items.orders: Order management and delivery of digital files
items.legal: Compliance with legal and tax obligations
items.improvement: Improvement of our services and user experience

legalBasis.title: 5. LEGAL BASIS
legalBasis.intro: The processing of your data is based on:

items.contract: Contract execution: For the provision of our services
items.interest: Legitimate interest: For service improvement and fraud prevention
items.obligation: Legal obligation: For compliance with tax regulations

retention.title: 6. DATA RETENTION
retention.content: We will retain your personal data for the time necessary to fulfill the purposes for which they were collected and, in any case, for the periods established by applicable legislation (minimum 6 years for tax and accounting data).

recipients.title: 7. DATA RECIPIENTS
recipients.intro: Your data may be communicated to:
recipients.confidentiality: All recipients are subject to strict confidentiality obligations.

transfers.title: 8. INTERNATIONAL TRANSFERS
transfers.content: In case of data transfers outside the European Economic Area, we guarantee that they are carried out with due guarantees and appropriate safeguards in accordance with the GDPR.

rights.title: 9. YOUR RIGHTS
rights.intro: According to the GDPR, you have the right to:

items.access: Access: Know what data we process about you
items.rectification: Rectification: Correct inaccurate or incomplete data
items.erasure: Erasure: Request deletion of your data
items.restriction: Restriction: Restrict the processing of your data
items.portability: Portability: Receive your data in structured format
items.objection: Objection: Object to the processing of your data
items.withdrawal: Withdrawal of consent: At any time

rights.contact: To exercise these rights, you can contact us through the means provided on our website.

cookies.title: 10. COOKIES
cookies.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies for:
cookies.management: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

security.title: 11. SECURITY
security.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction.

authority.title: 12. SUPERVISORY AUTHORITY
authority.content: You have the right to file a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency (AEPD) if you consider that the processing of your data does not comply with current regulations.

modifications.title: 13. MODIFICATIONS
modifications.content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy. Modifications will be communicated through our website with due notice.

section1.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
section1.content: By accessing and using this website, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions of use. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use our website.

section2.title: 2. Use of the Website
section2.content: You may use our website for lawful purposes only. It is prohibited to use the site for any illegal or unauthorized purpose.
section2.additionalContent: You must not transmit worms, viruses, or any code of a destructive nature. Any breach of system or network security may result in civil or criminal liability.

section3.title: 3. Return Policy
section3.content: Due to the digital nature of our services, we generally do not offer refunds once the service has been provided.
section3.noReturns: No returns are accepted for completed digital services.
section3.legalBasis: This policy is based on applicable e-commerce regulations.
section3.consent: By making a purchase, you agree to this no-return policy.

section4.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
section4.content: In no event shall we be liable for indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses.
section4.disclaimer: Services are provided 'as is' without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied.

section5.title: 5. Modifications
section5.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Modifications will take effect immediately upon posting on the website.

section6.title: 6. Contact
section6.content: If you have any questions about these terms and conditions, you can contact us through our contact form.

section7.title: 7. Governing Law
section7.content: These terms and conditions are governed by the laws of Spain. Any dispute related to these terms will be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of Spanish courts.

section8.title: 8. Severability
section8.content: If any provision of these terms is deemed invalid or unenforceable, the remaining provisions will continue to be valid and enforceable to the fullest extent permitted by law.

section9.title: 9. Waiver
section9.content: No waiver by us of any term or condition set forth in these terms shall be deemed a further or continuing waiver of such term or condition or a waiver of any other term or condition.

section10.title: 10. Entire Agreement
section10.content: These terms constitute the entire agreement between you and us regarding the use of the website and supersede all prior agreements and understandings, whether written or oral.

banner.title: Cookie Settings
banner.description: We use cookies to improve your browsing experience, analyze site traffic and personalize content. By clicking 'Accept All', you consent to the use of all cookies.
banner.expandedDescription: Customize which cookies you want to accept. You can change these preferences at any time.

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us improve your browsing experience and provide personalized functionality.

functional.title: Functional cookies
functional.content: These cookies are essential for the website to function and cannot be disabled. They include session cookies and user preferences.

analytics.title: Analytics cookies
analytics.content: We use these cookies to understand how visitors interact with our website, which helps us improve it.

marketing.title: Marketing cookies
marketing.content: These cookies are used to display relevant advertisements and measure the effectiveness of our advertising campaigns.

howToManage.title: How to manage cookies
howToManage.content: You can control and/or delete cookies as you wish. You can delete all cookies that are already on your device and set most browsers to prevent them from being placed.
howToManage.browserSettings: Most web browsers allow some control of cookies through browser settings.
howToManage.moreInfo: For more information about cookies, including how to see what cookies have been set and how to manage and delete them, visit www.aboutcookies.org or www.allaboutcookies.org.

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-party cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content: Some of our business partners may use cookies on our site (for example, advertisers). However, we have no access to or control over these cookies.

cookieDuration.title: Cookie duration
cookieDuration.session: Session cookies: Deleted when you close your browser.
cookieDuration.persistent: Persistent cookies: Remain on your device for a set period or until you manually delete them.

consent.title: Your consent
consent.content: By using our website, you consent to the use of cookies in accordance with this cookie policy.

rights.title: Your rights
rights.content: You have the right to withdraw your consent at any time. You can also request information about what personal data we have about you and how we process it.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have any questions about this cookie policy, you can contact us through our contact form.

section1.title: 1. GENERAL POLICY
section1.content: Due to the digital nature of our products (ECU reprogramming files), NO RETURNS OR REFUNDS ARE ACCEPTED once the file download is completed.

section2.title: 2. LEGAL BASIS
section2.content: This policy is based on current Spanish legislation:
section2.legalText: The right of withdrawal shall not apply to contracts for the supply of digital content which is not supplied on a tangible medium if the performance has begun with the consumer's prior express consent and his acknowledgment that he thereby loses his right of withdrawal.

section3.title: 3. EXPRESS CONSENT
section3.content: By proceeding with the purchase and download of our digital files, you:
list: Grant your express consent for immediate delivery of digital content
Acknowledge that you lose your right of withdrawal once download begins
Accept that you cannot request a return or refund for any reason
Confirm that you have read and understood this policy before purchase

section4.title: 4. AFFECTED PRODUCTS
section4.content: This policy applies to ALL our digital products, including:
list: System deletion files (DPF, EGR, AdBlue, etc.)

section5.title: 5. INVALID REASONS FOR RETURN
section5.content: The following reasons do NOT constitute grounds for requesting a return:
list: Vehicle damage resulting from file use

section6.title: 6. PRE-PURCHASE VERIFICATION
section6.content: It is the customer's sole responsibility to verify before purchase:
list: File compatibility with your specific vehicle
Legality of use in your country/region

section7.title: 7. TECHNICAL SUPPORT
section7.content: Although we do not offer returns, we do provide:
section7.important: Important: Technical support does not include performance guarantee or liability for damages.

section8.title: 8. EXCEPTIONAL CASES
section8.content: In very exceptional cases, we might consider:
list: Technical error in delivering the correct file
Corrupted or damaged file (replacement will be provided, not refund)
Double charge due to payment system error
section8.note: These cases will be evaluated individually and the final decision will be at our discretion.

section9.title: 9. CLAIM PROCESS
section9.content: If you believe your case falls under the mentioned exceptions:
list: Contact us within 24 hours after purchase
Provide clear evidence of the technical problem

section10.title: 10. ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS
section10.content: By making a purchase on our website, you confirm that you have read, understood and fully accept this Refund Policy, as well as our Terms of Service.

warning.title: ⚠️ IMPORTANT WARNING
warning.content: Modifying your vehicle's ECU carries significant risks. By using our files, you assume ALL RESPONSIBILITY for any consequences that may arise.

section1.title: 1. NATURE OF RISKS
section1.content: ECU reprogramming involves modifying the operating parameters of the engine and other vehicle systems. This may result in:
risks: Mechanical damage: Engine, turbo, clutch, transmission failure
Electrical damage: ECU, sensor, actuator failures
Warranty loss: Complete voiding of manufacturer warranty
Emission problems: Non-compliance with environmental regulations
Legal problems: Traffic violations or local regulation breaches

section2.title: 2. TOTAL EXEMPTION FROM LIABILITY
section2.content: WE EXPRESSLY DECLARE that we are NOT responsible for:
exemptions: Any direct, indirect, incidental or consequential damage
Repair or replacement costs of components
Loss of time, profits or opportunities
Damage to third parties or their properties

section3.title: 3. NO PERFORMANCE WARRANTIES
noGuarantees: Specific increases in power or torque

section4.title: 4. USER RESPONSIBILITY
section4.content: By using our files, you accept that it is your EXCLUSIVE RESPONSIBILITY to:
responsibilities: Verify compatibility with your specific vehicle
Make backups of the original programming

section5.title: 5. PROFESSIONAL INSTALLATION RECOMMENDED
section5.content: WE STRONGLY RECOMMEND that installation be performed by:
section5.warning: WARNING: Incorrect installation can cause irreversible and dangerous damage.

section6.title: 6. LEGAL LIMITATIONS
section6.content: IMPORTANT: The use of our files may:
section6.note: It is your responsibility to verify and comply with all applicable laws in your location.

section7.title: 7. EXCLUSIVE USE ON CLOSED CIRCUIT
section7.content: Our files are designed for EXCLUSIVE USE IN COMPETITION AND CLOSED CIRCUITS. Use on public roads may be illegal and dangerous. The user assumes all responsibility for the use made of the files.

section9.title: 9. INSURANCE AND COVERAGE
section9.content: WARNING: ECU modifications may void your insurance policy. It is your responsibility to inform your insurance company about any modifications and verify that you maintain adequate coverage.

section10.title: 10. RISK ACCEPTANCE
section10.content: By downloading and using our files, you expressly declare that:
acceptance: You have read and fully understood this disclaimer
You accept all risks associated with ECU modifications
You waive any claims against our company
You assume full responsibility for the consequences of its use
You have the legal capacity to assume these risks

finalReminder.title: FINAL REMINDER
finalReminder.content: If you are not willing to assume ALL the risks mentioned in this document, DO NOT USE OUR FILES. Its use implies total acceptance of these terms.
